mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMPANY_INQUIRY(ID, COMPANY_INQUIRY_TYPE, COMPANY_INQUIRY_DETAIL, COMPANY_INQUIRY_STATUS, MEMBER_ID, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_COMPANY_INQUIRY.NEXTVAL, #{companyInquiryType}, #{companyInquiryDetail}, #{companyInquiryStatus}, #{memberId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CI.ID, COMPANY_INQUIRY_TYPE, C.COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_INQUIRY_DETAIL, M.MEMBER_NAME, TO_CHAR(CI.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATED_DATE, COMPANY_INQUIRY_STATUS FROM TBL_COMPANY_INQUIRY CI JOIN TBL_COMPANY_MEMBER CM ON CI.MEMBER_ID = CM.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON CM.ID = M.ID JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON CM.COMPANY_ID = C.ID WHERE CI.ID = #{id}

SELECT CI.ID, COMPANY_INQUIRY_TYPE, C.COMPANY_NAME, M.MEMBER_NAME, CI.CREATED_DATE, COMPANY_INQUIRY_STATUS, COMPANY_INQUIRY_DETAIL FROM TBL_COMPANY_INQUIRY CI JOIN TBL_COMPANY_MEMBER CM ON CI.MEMBER_ID = CM.ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON CM.ID = M.ID JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON CM.COMPANY_ID = C.ID WHERE CI.ID = #{id}

SELECT CI.ID, COMPANY_INQUIRY_TYPE, COMPANY_INQUIRY_DETAIL, COMPANY_INQUIRY_STATUS, TO_CHAR(CI.CREATED_DATE) AS CREATED_DATE FROM TBL_COMPANY_INQUIRY CI JOIN TBL_COMPANY_MEMBER CM ON CI.MEMBER_ID = CM.ID WHERE CM.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
